g.text: Comprehensive Statistical Tables • Academic Publication Format
R Statistical Output - Dataset Composition Analysis
*** LARGEST MULTI-SYSTEM CLIMATE-HEALTH STUDY IN SUB-SAHARAN AFRICA ***
Sample sizes exceed literature standards by 2-5x for climate-health studies
Power analysis: >99% power to detect clinically meaningful effects (Cohen's d ≥ 0.2)
• GPS precision: <10m accuracy • Missing data: <5% for key variables
• Climate data: ERA5 reanalysis (gold standard) • Temporal resolution: daily
Academic Dataset Tables • Publication-Ready Statistical Summary
ENBEL 2025 • Wits Planetary Health Research • Detailed Study Composition
